Minutes. Veterans of the Ninth Regiment, N.G.S.N.Y.
Minutes. Veterans of the Ninth Regiment, N.G.S.N.Y.
A circular of 1869 in the volume, and the subject matter of the earliest entries in the volume (1871) suggest that these were the first, or earliest documented, meetings of the Veterans Association.
